dct_title_s: Hudson County, New Jersey hub, circa 1925
dct_description_sm: Map of the Journal Square Plaza area of Jersey City, Hudson County, N.J. including the Journal Square tube station and Pennsylvania Railroad. Legend shows travel time from Journal Square to major stations in Newark, N.J. and New York City. Two drawn illustrations.
